title: Prime Minister Harper Hides in Closet National Post Oct 24 2014
description:
This is a saved web page from Canada's National Post on  Friday 24 2014 in regards to Prime Minister Stephen Harper's whereabouts during an attack on Canadian Parliament. 

One soldier was killed and the Sargent at Arms Mr. Vickers killed the terrorist. 

It was learned that the Prime Minister was hiding in a closet while members of his caucus ( who apparently did not know he was in there) were fashioning home made weapons to defend themselves and others. 

The National Post changed the headline half way through the day from "As shooting started, Stephen Harper hid in a closet," to "As Ottawa shooting broke out, PM was kept hidden in a closet"

This page from "Way Back Machine" internet archive and just in case it disappears from there. 

Open folder and click on the web page icon. It will open in your browser
